welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Malibu, where the sun meets the ocean and charm meets luxury. Get ready to experience the stunning beaches, delicious cuisine, and vibrant culture that make Malibu a must-visit destination. Enjoy your stay and explore all that this beautiful city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Ynez Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Santa Ynez Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Monica Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Santa Monica Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: The main international terminal at LAX, serving over 30 airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at LAX, serving Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serving international flights for Delta Air Lines and Aeromexico.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serving domestic flights for Delta Air Lines and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: Serving domestic flights for Alaska Airlines, Air Canada, and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but it may be limited in some areas.

airports.airport_name: Point Mugu NAS (Naval Base Ventura County

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Point Mugu NAS serves both military and civilian flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Wifi is available for free throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ventura Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Ventura Airport, serving regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bob Hope Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Bob Hope Airport serves regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Oxnard Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Oxnard Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A private terminal for private and charter flights at Torrance Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
